name: Hill Runner
description:
Hill Runner is a small game made for the Weekly Game Jam with the theme "Mountain Climber". The goal is to get a high score, while avoiding the obstacles. You gain score by traveling more.

Controls:

  • A-D or arrow keys to move
  • W to jump (while mid air to double jump)
  • Space or Left Click to dash and destroy any obstacles
  • Esc to pause the game

Special thanks: Horizon (music producer)

Find him!   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC51fb3qTeZ_2wxLb0IRPYfw/videos
